009package imagingbook.common.util.choice;
010
011// Superclass or interface
012public abstract class ExampleTraditional {
013        
014        // Choices for the user to select
015        public enum Choice {
016                A, B, C;
017        }
018        
019        // Dispatcher to instantiate choices
020        public static ExampleTraditional getInstance(Choice m) {
021                ExampleTraditional instance = null;
022                switch(m) {
023                case A:
024                        instance = new ChoiceA(); break;
025                case B:
026                        instance = new ChoiceB(); break;
027                case C:
028                        instance = new ChoiceC(); break;
029                }
030                return instance;
031        }
032        
033        // Concrete subclasses to be instantiated:
034        
035        public static class ChoiceA extends ExampleTraditional {
036                // ...
037        }
038        
039        public static class ChoiceB extends ExampleTraditional {
040                // ...
041        }
042        
043        public static class ChoiceC extends ExampleTraditional {
044                // ...
045        }
046        
047        // -----------------------------------------------------------------
048        
049        public static void main(String[] args) {
050                for (Choice c : ExampleTraditional.Choice.values()) {
051                        ExampleTraditional instance = ExampleTraditional.getInstance(c);
052                        System.out.println("instance = " + instance.getClass().getName());
053                        // do something with instance ...
054                }
055        }
056
057}
